Rewards Rate: 2 Reward Points on every Rs 100 spent using this KVB credit card.
Reward Redemption: You can redeem your reward points by calling the customer care number at 1800 419 6500/022-404 260 31. The customers can log in to your internet banking or mobile banking

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 2% fuel surcharge waiver on fuel transactions per month 300 for transactions of Rs 400 to Rs 4000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2% on the withdrawal amount or Rs 100 whichever is higher
